subject: Basketball
Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: After the Nets ceded an eight-point lead in the final minutes, Vince Carter missed a game-tying 3-pointer as time expired in their 105-102 loss to the Orlando Magic.
snippet: After the Nets ceded an eight-point lead in the final minutes, Vince Carter missed a game-tying 3-pointer as time expired in their 105-102 loss to the Orlando Magic.
